title: A Supergravity Dual of a (1,0) Field Theory in Six Dimensions
abstract: We suggest a supergravity dual for the $(1,0)$ superconformal field theory in six dimensions which has $E_8$ global symmetry. Compared to the description of the (2,0) field theory, the 4-sphere is replaced by a 4-hemisphere, or by orbifolding the 4-sphere.
